text: Not sure Megyn should worry TOO much about the National Enquirer, considering they helped push the silly narrative that Elvis was still alive … and that Ted Cruz ’ s dad helped kill JFK. Does anyone really take this rag seriously? Trump ’ s pals at National Enquirer carrying water again pic. twitter. com / OI7P1zYMlu — David Frum ( @ davidfrum ) June 9, 2017 If we ’ re going to talk about ‘ carrying water, ’ we have to bring up The New York Times, right? Washington Post? At least the National Enquirer knows very few people take it seriously … the others pretend they ’ re real journalists. And look, Chelsea is trying to bond with Megyn over it :. @ megynkelly
